name: INSiriAuthorizationStatus
desc: Constants indicating the authorization status of your Intents extension.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: Not yet determined. An authorization request has not yet been made or the user has not yet made a choice regarding the status of the app. Call the requestSiriAuthorization(_:) method to request authorization from the user.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: Restricted. The app is not authorized to use Siri services. This status could be the result of active restrictions on Siri services rather than on the user denying access.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: Not authorized. The user explicitly denied authorization for this app.

items.name: case authorized
items.desc: Authorized. Siri is enabled and your app is authorized to interact with it.
